Let's try out the combat system.
Welcome! To the combat tutorial
You will have 4 options while in combat: "Attack", "Defend", "Items", and "Cry"
Crying does nothing you baby bitch (jk we'll change that to dodge)
Type the name of the option or the integer value into the terminal to commit to that action
Congrats on finishing the tutorial!
In case you didn't see, if you mess up an input your turn will be lost.
This is not a bug but an intended feature
Go forth in your journey.
